CustomField.description:
Used to compare the Associated Code Title Case Sub Type before and after update. Populated via Flow "AssociatedCodes : Record-Trigger : Before Save : updateCheckCertainEditsOnCodeTitleChangeCheck
If Case Sub Type multipicklist field contains the value of Sub Type field of Case then update this field to 'CodeTitleChange' else update to 'False'
Used with Validation rule CheckCertainEditsOnCodeTitleChange.
CustomField.label: CheckCertainEditsOnCodeTitleChange Check
